description.lang: The ZDW232 is a single dimming receiver which controls the connected load ON/OFF and DIM/BRIGHT and also serves as a transmitter using multiple switch taps (controls one group of 5 Z-Wave modules).ZDW232 replaces an existing wall switch.ZDW232 can be programmed as a routing slave to establish firm signal routes and can be "associated" with other Z-wave devices in order to control them.ZDW232 can be configured to Control Shades or Window Coverings via Z-Wave network
